message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 3-a-1, translated into en
data: Reports either downloaded from websites, submitted through the WHO FCTC reporting platform or emailed by national counterparts. WHO shares and makes public the methodologies for its estimates through the WHO global report on trends in tobacco use 2000-2025 and the WHO Report on the Global Tobacco Epidemic. The WHO estimates undergo country consultation prior to publication.
